title: No Smoking Indoors
description: Please keep the condo smoke-free. If you need to smoke, feel free to use the outdoor balcony, but kindly dispose of cigarette butts responsibly.

title: Quiet Hours
description: Jacó is a vibrant town, but we value peace and relaxation. Please keep noise to a minimum between 10 PM and 7 AM, especially on the balcony or in common areas.

title: No Pets
description: While we love animals, the condo building has a strict no-pets policy to accommodate guests with allergies.

title: Maximum Occupancy
description: Our condo comfortably accommodates 4 guests. For everyone's comfort and safety, please do not exceed this limit.

title: Keep the Sand Outside
description: Jacó's beaches are beautiful, but the sand is better left there! Please rinse off in the outdoor shower by the pool before entering the condo.

title: Respect the Neighbors
description: Many residents live here year-round. Please be mindful of their space and avoid excessive noise in common areas.

title: Air Conditioning
description: We know it can get hot, but please be mindful of energy use. Turn off the air conditioning when you're out exploring or enjoying the beach.

title: Check-in and Check-out
description: Check-in is at 3 PM, and check-out is by 11 AM. Please notify us in advance if you need to adjust these times.

title: Trash and Recycling
description: Kindly dispose of trash in the bins provided, and separate recyclables when possible. Trash pickup days are posted in the lobby.

title: Enjoy and Relax
description: Most importantly, make yourself at home! Enjoy the stunning views, the vibrant town of Jacó, and everything Costa Rica has to offer.
